message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take 60 and you can have 40. It's a good starting point.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to give away too much too soon. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. I'll take 80 and you can have 20. It's a fair compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, let's split it 50/50. It's the fairest way to divide the money.
